mapper.select:
select id ,groupId ,title ,writer ,content ,DATE_FORMAT(startDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as start ,DATE_FORMAT(endDate , '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as end ,DATE_FORMAT(startDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as startDt ,DATE_FORMAT(endDate , '%Y-%m-%d') as endDt ,DATE_FORMAT(startDate, '%H:%i') as startTi ,DATE_FORMAT(endDate , '%H:%i') as endTi ,allDay ,textColor ,backgroundColor ,borderColor from calendar where 1=1
and id = #{id}
